parameters.query: SELECT i.*, cf.nom as client_nom, cf.raison_sociale as client_raison_sociale FROM invoices i LEFT JOIN client_finals cf ON i.client_final_id = cf.id WHERE i.id = $1 AND i.tenant_id = $2;
SELECT * FROM invoice_lines WHERE invoice_id = $1 ORDER BY ordre ASC;
SELECT id FROM exercices_comptables WHERE tenant_id = $1 AND cloture = false ORDER BY date_debut DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(numero_piece FROM 'EC-[0-9]{4}-([0-9]+)') AS INTEGER)), 0) + 1 as next_num FROM ecritures_comptables WHERE tenant_id = $1 AND numero_piece LIKE 'EC-' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY') || '-%';

INSERT INTO ecritures_comptables (id, tenant_id, exercice_id, journal_code, numero_piece, date_ecriture, libelle, reference_doc, source_auto, source_id, statut) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), $1, $2, 'VE', $3, $4, $5, $6, 'facture', $7, 'validee') RETURNING id, numero_piece;

INSERT INTO lignes_ecritures (id, ecriture_id, numero_compte, libelle_ligne, debit, credit, ordre) VALUES
(gen_random_uuid(), $1, '411000', 'Client - ' || $2, $3, 0, 0),
(gen_random_uuid(), $4, $5, 'Produit HT - ' || $6, 0, $7, 1),
(gen_random_uuid(), $8, '445710', 'TVA collectée - ' || $9, 0, $10, 2)
RETURNING id, numero_compte, debit, credit;
